title: Sampler, early 20th century
medium:
Medium: silk and cotton embroidery on cotton foundation
Technique: embroidered in satin, back and double running stitches on plain weave foundation
signed: Dealer's number 446/180 inked in upper right. Another indecipherable number in upper left.
description: Scattered motifs of geometrical forms and corners.  Inked on dealer's number: 446/180 upper right.  Another undecipherable number in upper left.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sampler, early 20th century.
early 20th century. Medium: silk and cotton embroidery on cotton foundation
Technique: embroidered in satin, back and double running stitches on plain weave foundation. Bequest of Gertrude M. Oppenheimer. 1981-28-25.
